verbs.description: [ARG0: Mohammad and Aiman Haddad] [V: escaped] [ARG1: their home in Aleppo , Syria] [ARGM-TMP: in May 2014] . Mohammad came to America , while Aiman got stuck in Turkey . They 're now anxiously awaiting the Supreme Court 's decision on the Trump administration 's travel ban .
